name: Pet Help Finder
description: Database of low-cost vet services, financial assistance, and pet resources by location
fullDescription: Pet Help Finder is a searchable database that helps pet owners locate low-cost veterinary services and financial assistance programs by zip code.
whatTheyOffer:
- Searchable database of low-cost vet clinics
- Financial assistance program listings
- Pet food bank locations
- Emergency assistance resources
- Results customized by location
howToGetIt:
1. Visit pethelpfinder.org
2. Enter your zip code
3. Select the type of help you need
4. Browse results for your area
5. Contact providers directly for services
keywords: Pet Help Finder, low-cost vet, pet financial assistance, pet food bank, emergency pet, vet locator, zip code search
